decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B5, B24, T31, T63, Replacement UDP Policies 4.3, 4.8, 5.9, 9.11. | Notwithstanding the approved plans date stamped 15 March 2004, the frontage fence shall be less than or equal to 0.6 metres in height before the access is brought into use and shall be so retained permanently.  REASON:  In the interests of pedestrian safety, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies T31, T63, Replacement UDP Policies 4.3, 9.11.
description: Formation of vehicle access, alterations to layout of front garden and formation of four bin stores
